Sample proportion = p = Î£( Nh / N ) * ph

```{r}
data = read.csv('maskData.csv')
total = sum(data$total)
obs = sum(data$mask)
sample_p=obs/total
p = 0.65
z_score = (sample_p-p)/(sqrt((p*(1-p))/total))
pnorm(z_score)
z_score
ci =  pnorm(z_score)*1.96*(sqrt(sample_p*(1-sample_p)/349))
lower = sample_p+ci
upper = sample_p-ci
lower
upper
```
